Description: Find the coffee machine and make some coffee.
Find some plates and bowls and if they are dirty,clean them with a dish sponge.
Find an apple and slice it with a knife.
Find a bread and put it in a toaster to toast it.
Find a egg and fry it on the pan using a spatula
Slice the tomato and then add it into a pot with water for boiling
Cut some lettuce using knife and boil it in a pot on gas burner.Pour some salt and pepper using shakers.
Take some water in a pot and keep it on a gas burner to boil it.
Find some eggs in the room and if some cracked eggs found then throw them in the bin.
Find the fridge and remove the rotten foods and drop them in the bin.

Firstly transfer all the potato slices into a bowl. Now put the bowl inside the microwave oven and set the timer and temperature on it. After the time completes open the microwave and take out the bowl.
Firstly take a clean cup. Open the wine bottle and pour required amount of wine into the cup. Then close the wine bottle.
Take the food (apple, bread, egg, lettuce, tomato etc) and open the fridge door. Now keep the food inside the fridge and close fridge door.
Firstly take a clean cup. Take the mug and pour required amount of water into the cup.
Pick up the potato that is next to bread by the window and put in pot that is sitting on the stove. Fill pot with water and use the stove knob to turn it on to boil.
Take all the unused apple slices and throw them away in the bin.
Take all the kitchen utensils (like bowl, butter knife, cup, knife, plate, spoon, spatula etc). Open the drawer and keep all these things in it. Then close the drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_15_6
Description: Take the cup of coffee and pour the coffee into the sink.
Take the pot and pour away the water inside it into the sink.
Switch off the light switch in the kitchen.
Find the laptop and use it
Take the remote and switch on the television to watch

Task: Check the timing on the watch_219_6
Description: locate the watch and see the time
Take all things one by one to pack into a box
Locate the used tissue box and throw it

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_219_6
Description: Find the switch of the table lamp and turn it off
Drop the hand phone and check if the screen is cracked
Locate the handphone and pick up the dial to use it
Look for the sofa, and if there is anything of the sofa then clear it.
Walk to coffee table. Pick up book. Hold book with cover facing up. Open book to first page.
